siteMetadata.title: Mᴇʟʟᴏᴡ Aʀᴘᴇɢɢɪᴀᴛɪᴏɴ
siteMetadata.description: Mellow Arpeggiation, also known as George William Paton. A Game Developer, Musician, and Director of Mellow Pty Ltd. Located in Melbourne, Victoria. George is developing indie games with a taste for the functional, minimal, and heartwarming.
